events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund because it does not match what I purchased.
The reported issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's description of receiving an incorrect item.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund claim regarding the incorrect order sent to the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the incorrect item you received and the order number to proceed with the refund?
Here is the photo of the item I received along with the order number 12345. The item is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you a prepaid return label for the wrong item.
Thank you for the quick response and the solution offered. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the return label was sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and if everything is satisfactory on your end. Please contact us if you have any more questions.
As we haven’t heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and we hope to serve you better next time.
